title: downloading Thunderbird has corrupted a MAPI function - can you help?
content:
I constantly used email to send images to my watercolor students. Still use PICASA, a Google app that hasn't been supported in years, but still works fine, and immediately would send the selected photos via emClient email. BUT THEN i decided to download Thunderbird; it did not have certain functions i wanted (I doubt any program does), so my computer guy de-installed it. BUT THE PROBLEM is, when i went to Picasa to email photos to a class, it did not automatically open an emClient window, but gave me the choice of using Thunderbird or GoogleMail. ??? even tho Thun. was de=installed. My consultant found it was a MAPI Problem, and we have spent hours trying to fix it, with no luck. FastStone photo editing would also not work to send emails. Is it possible that downloading Thunderbird could have somehow correupted my general MAPI function?

We have spent HOURS trying to fix it, and no luck. Finally i said, let's re-install Thunderbird, and at least now i can email photos directly from FastStone. But not from Picasa, which is a huge loss to me. PLEASE, i know Picasa is ancient, but now it doesn't even give me the choice of Thun. or Gmail when I click on "Send by email". Please, can anyone help with this MAPI issue?? My consultant tried everything, but it seems to be corrupted in some way. Thank you so much!
creator: iaconetti

title: mailbox pane display order
content: I have five mailboxes and am migrating from Outlook. The transfer of the mailboxes was done successfully by Thunderbird but the order of the mailboxes from top to bottom is not what I want. I want to have my most used email account at the top of the list. Is their a way to rearrange the mailbox order from top to bottom?
creator: phillipsfamd

title: authentication required
content: cannot send mails anymore from smtp.web.de server error: "authentication required" WHAT SHOULD I DO ??
creator: t.lutterotti

title: Passcode
content: I can't Use Thunderbird with passcode. I did not understand the discussion about Comcast passcode.How do you turn on two step verification (Comcast MFA) jeraldasmith@ieee.org
